name: Where Dragon Spirits 龙魂在哪里
name_original: Where Dragon Spirits 龙魂在哪里
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1074190/Dragon_Spirits



The Dragon Spirits series crossover search game will keep your eyes busy.
Find all the hiding Dragon Spirits.
Well hand-drawn 4K scenes filled with adorable dragons.
Short gameplay that won't take up too much of the player's time.
Choose your favorite coloring, convenient for color-blind players.
Very easy to grab all achievements.
Autosave and load feature.
Local timer rankings.
No penalties, so just relax and enjoy the casual gameplay.
Friendly for all ages, can be played with family and friends altogether.
